author: julianfoad
msg: Move the core of 'svnversion' functionality into libsvn_wc as a function, so
that it can be used by other client applications, e.g. possibly 'svn' later.
Rewrite this code so that it no longer uses libsvn_client, just libsvn_wc.
New file, copied from subversion/svnversion/main.c and modified,
(main): Call svn_wc_revision_status() instead of doing the job.
Remove svn_client from the dependencies of svnversion.

author: julianfoad
msg: (main): Remove a check left over from an earlier use of the cancellation
facility to avoid processing externals.  Most of that code was removed

author: lundblad
msg: * www/hacking.html (Theory and documentation): Fix reference to the design
spec and note that it is XML, not texinfo.  Link to the generated API
(Coding style): Drop first paragraph which didn't belong here anyway.
